#include<cstdio>
inline void fastRead_int(long long int &x) {
    register long long int c = getchar_unlocked();
    x = 0;
    long long neg = 0;

    for(; ((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-'); c = getchar_unlocked());

    if(c=='-') {
        neg = 1;
    	c = getchar_unlocked();
    }

    for(; c>47 && c<58 ; c = getchar_unlocked()) {
    	x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }

    if(neg)
    	x = -x;
}
int main(){
long t;
scanf("%ld",&t);
while(t--){
    long long int p,q;
    fastRead_int(p);
    fastRead_int(q);
    if((p&1)&&(q&1))
        printf("B\n");
    else
        printf("A\n");
}
return 0;
}
